questions.question:
A machine learning team is using Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth to label a dataset for an object detection task.
They want to reduce labeling costs without sacrificing quality.
What strategy provided by Ground Truth would BEST help the team achieve this?
options: Fully manual labeling by a private workforce within the organization.
Use a completely automated machine learning model to handle all labeling tasks.
Utilize a third-party vendor for all labeling tasks to ensure the highest accuracy.
Implement active learning, where a model labels simple cases, and human labelers handle complex cases.
correct_answers: Implement active learning, where a model labels simple cases, and human labelers handle complex cases.
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 3
